kw.name: Open browser and go to hamk.fi
Open Browser
kw.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Handle cookies and switch to english
Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

test.name: Test “Latest News” section articles

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get WebElements
kw.doc: Returns a list of WebElement objects matching the ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Go Back
kw.doc: Simulates the user clicking the back button on their browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
